arts.ttl: OGC Nice crash out of the Europa League
arts.sum: OGC Nice’s exit from the UEFA Europa League has been confirmed after a 1-0 defeat to IF Elfsborg in Sweden on Thursday night. Nice had looked on course for an…

arts.ttl: “Yes, it sounds nice” – Defender chuffed with Liverpool links, won’t stop progress
arts.sum: Slavia Prague youngster Malick Diouf has admitted he is enjoying recent links to Liverpool, although career progress is top of the list for him. MF DNES cover comments from the defender (who can play left-back and left wing-back) today in which they discuss the growing transfer interest around him. arts.ttl: OGC Nice predicted XI v Elfsborg: Franck Haise leaves three key players back in France
arts.sum: OGC Nice have now entered the last-chance saloon. Without a win in this year’s UEFA Europa League, they must win away to Elfsborg tonight if they are to have any…

arts.ttl: Official | Baptiste Santamaria joins OGC Nice from Rennes
arts.sum: OGC Nice have confirmed the signing of Baptiste Santamaria (29) on loan from Ligue 1 rivals Stade Rennais. Santamaria, who played 127 games for Rennes (four goals, six assists) since…
